name: I bid 500 million!!

trigger.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's cost 6 or lower Characters, or return it to it's owners hand

text: Main K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's cost 1 or lower Characters, or return it to it's owners hand or place it at the top or bottom of it's owner's life. Then, if you have a (Celestial Dragon) type character, draw 1 card. Trigger K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's cost 6 or lower Characters, or return it to it's owners hand

effect.text: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's cost 1 or lower Characters, or return it to it's owners hand or place it at the top or bottom of it's owner's life. Then, if you have a (Celestial Dragon) type character, draw 1 card.
K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's cost 6 or lower Characters, or return it to it's owners hand
